title: Side Effects of Black Girls are Magic (with Lilly Workneh and CaShawn Thompson)
description:
This week we talk to Lilly Workneh, editor of Good Night Stories for Rebel Girls: 100 Real-Life Tales of Black Girl Magic, and CaShawn Thomspon, creator of #BlackGirlsAreMagic about why Black girls’ stories matter.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
